id.description: Unique identifier for the call entry

to.description: Destination of the call, e.g., phone number

duration.description: Duration of the call in seconds

sentiment.description: Emotional tone or feeling associated with the call

disposition.description: Outcome or result of the call

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the call was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the call was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier for the user associated with the call

_href.description: Link to the user associated with the call

id.description: Unique identifier for the action related to the call
Unique identifier for the person who was called

_href.description: Link to the person who was called

id.description: Unique identifier for the CRM activity associated with the call

_href.description: Link to the CRM activity associated with the call

id.description: Unique identifier for the note related to the call

_href.description: Link to the note related to the call

id.description: Unique identifier for the cadence associated with the call

_href.description: Link to the cadence associated with the call

id.description: Unique identifier for the step in the cadence associated with the call

_href.description: Link to the step in the cadence associated with the call
